comments:
Hi,

I installed eclipse in the version 2.1.2 and copy the EMF version 1.1.1 
framework to the plugin and features folder. After that I installed the tomcat
plugin 2.1 and the UML2 plugin.

Now I have an error message by creating a tomcat project.
On the other Hand, my old Project from eclipse 2.1 was overwritten and demaged.

Your sinserly, Martin Kastner

It looks like the tomcat plugin is failing when it tries to create the project, 
so this report should be logged with them.  I would move this report to them 
myself, but I have no clue who they are (com.sysdeo?), because I do not know 
where the tomcat plugin comes from.

Closing report since there is nothing for swt to do here.
